mainText:
we lost the last bright mind of the 20th century... i'm a mac user since 1992...now i got 24 years old... my life turn around the simplicity of the things... and around of the philosophy of "think different"... we can make the difference making a simple life... Steve make our life so simple...

i'm thankful for all this things... this differences and simple things... we will miss you steve!... see you some day... in some iCloud in the sunny sky... all my condolences to the Steve's family, and to the Apple's family. Steve: thanks for all!
author: Victor
